name.en: Accounting Research in the Capital Market

goal.ch: "Provide students with a general understanding of financial accounting and reporting research in the last several decades. The theories, research methodologies, and empirical findings underlying this area of studies will be illustrated. In addition, this course will discuss the role and implications of the accounting research for accounting practice and capital market development."
